name: 口譯技巧（四）
restrict: ◎限本系(含雙主修)修習 ◎課程不開放上修
description: 本課程延續「口譯技巧（三）」之課程內容，持續加強中英雙向逐步口譯的基本技巧。
goals: 學生更加熟練逐步口譯之技巧
透過認識不同題材內容與語篇型式，學習掌握了解、筆記、轉換、產生之重點
繼續提昇工作語言能力
syllabus:
課程名稱：口譯技巧 (四)

授課教師：汝明麗

授課時間：每周五上午09:10-12:00

授課教室：R506

Objectives：  
The course aims to improve students’ techniques in consecutive interpretation both from English to Chinese and from Chinese to English on the one hand, and to introduce simultaneous interpreting/whispering to the students on the other hand. Upon successful completion of the course, students should be able to:  
1\. Become more aware of subject matters covered in this semester.  
2\. Improve ability to screen through source language and grasp messages that should be rendered.  
3\. Take only useful and relevant notes.  
4\. Interpret in accurate and polished Chinese the messages that should be delivered.

In other words, by the end of Semester Four, the student should be able to deal with CI segments of normal length on a wider range of topics, including a couple of more technical ones.

The final four weeks of the semester will be devoted to the training of simultaneous interpreting/whispering. The purpose of the four-week training is to familiarize the students with simultaneity exercises and related pedagogical issues.

  
Implementation：  
1\. The instructor shall explain topics to be covered during the semester in the first session and students are expected to serve as speakers giving either English or Chinese presentations in class each week.  
2\. Students shall be divided into groups to practice consecutive interpretation. The instructor will facilitate discussion and then provide feedback.  
3\. Assignments are given weekly. Students are expected to practice after class hours and keep practice logs/reflective journals.

**課程目標**

\--在上學期的基礎上，透過課堂、課餘練習與檢討，找出每位同學做逐步口譯時的優缺點，保持長處的同時針對缺點加強練習，最後改善同學聽、寫、說這三個階段的協調整合。

\--筆記系統尚有問題者持續改進，而實際譯文的評量標準仍以訊息準確完整為主，表達通順自然為輔。

\--除指導雙向逐步口譯技巧，擴大知識領域外，也將於期中考周後開始介紹同步口譯入門。

**授課方式：**

老師尋找適合的會議演講素材，前八週除了每次上課的短逐步練習以為暖身，並為第九週起的同步課程預做準備外，長逐步將盡量在同一主題下做到雙向練習。

第九週介紹同步口譯入門與同步聽說練習，之後各週將利用自前一學期至今練習過的逐步口譯素材搭配新演講題材，讓同學練習雙向同步口譯。
